Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli and Ravindra Jadeja have retired from T20I format for India.
Angelo Mathews has retired from Sri Lanka, and Charith Asalanka has replaced Wanindu Hasaranga as the new captain.
India recently won the 2024 T20 World Cup, while Sri Lanka was knocked out in the first round.
India sent a second-string side to Zimbabwe where they won the five-match T20I series 4-1.
Sri Lanka players were busy with the Lanka Premier League where Asalanka led Jaffna Kings to the title.
Sri Lanka have been dealing with injuries and illnesses, forcing them to call up Ramesh Mendis as a standby.
Shubman Gill has been named the new vice-captain for India's T20Is, showing faith in his performance despite previous struggles.
India are expected to pick Ravi Bishnoi as a third spinner over Khaleel Ahmed, and Shivam Dube, Rinku Singh, Sanju Samson and Riyan Parag will compete for one middle-order spot.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jasprit Bumrah has been rested for this series.
There is a forecast for rain during the daytime but not in the evening, which might affect the match.
